title: Advanced React Development
description: Master advanced concepts of React.js in this comprehensive course. Learn about hooks, context API, and advanced component patterns while building complex and scalable applications.

instructor.name: Tech Academy
instructor.description: Tech Academy is a renowned online learning platform that offers a wide range of tech courses. Our mission is to provide quality education to learners worldwide, focusing on practical and industry-relevant skills.

title: Introduction to Redux
description: This part-time course offers a deep dive into state management using Redux. Learn how to manage application state efficiently in complex React applications with real-world examples.

instructor.name: Code Masters
instructor.description: Code Masters is dedicated to providing top-notch coding education, offering a range of courses designed to help developers of all levels improve their skills.

title: React Native for Mobile Development
description: Learn how to build native mobile applications using React Native in this full-time course. Covering everything from setup to deployment, this course is perfect for developers looking to expand their skill set to mobile platforms.

instructor.name: Mobile Dev School
instructor.description: Mobile Dev School specializes in courses focused on mobile development. With expert instructors and a hands-on approach, we prepare our students to excel in the mobile development industry.

title: React for Beginners
description: This beginner-friendly course introduces you to the basics of React.js. Learn how to build simple, interactive UIs and gain the foundational knowledge needed to advance in web development.

instructor.name: WebDev Bootcamp
instructor.description: WebDev Bootcamp offers intensive bootcamp-style courses aimed at beginners and those looking to transition into web development. We focus on hands-on learning and real-world projects.

title: Full Stack Development with React
description: Become a full-stack developer with this course that covers both front-end (React) and back-end technologies. Learn to build complete web applications from scratch.

instructor.name: Stack Builders Institute
instructor.description: Stack Builders Institute provides in-depth courses on full-stack development, helping students build the skills needed to create and manage complete web applications.
